description: The robot's gripper performs a Power:Large Diameter grasp on the Pringles can by closing its parallel jaws around the cylindrical body.
contact_details: The robot's gripper is grasping the Pringles can around its cylindrical body. The gripper appears to be a parallel jaw gripper, with the jaws closed around the can. The contact points are along the sides of the can, where the gripper jaws are in contact.
